title: Guardrails off for Anthropic: Firm tweaks AI safety policy amid heightened competition, lack of regulation—what changes?
snippet: Once focused on the proper development of AI technology with safety in mind, Anthropic is now weakening its foundational safety principle amid growing competition and lack of government regulation.

title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra vs iPhone 17 Pro Max: Spec-by-spec breakdown, India pricing, and features compared
snippet: Samsung launched the Galaxy S26 Ultra, competing with Apple's iPhone 17 Pro Max. The S26 Ultra does introduce a new Privacy Display and faster 60W wired charging, but whether these upgrades are enough to tempt long-time Apple users away remains an open question

title: Samsung Galaxy S26, S26+ with Exynos 2,600 Soc launched: Price, specs and more
snippet: Samsung launched the Galaxy S26 and S26+ with the Dynamic AMOLED displays, upgraded processors, and Qi2 charging. The S26 starts at $899.99 while the S26+ begins at $1,099.99&nbsp;

title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra with Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 processor launched in India: Price, specs and more
snippet: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S26 Ultra with Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 processor, AI features, and quad camera setup at the Galaxy Unpacked 2026 event. It features a 6.9-inch display, 5,000mAh battery with 60W fast charging

title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Launch Highlights: Galaxy S26, S26+, S26 Ultra launched with new AI features
snippet: Samsung S26 Launch Live: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S26, S26+ and S26 Ultra along with the Galaxy Buds 4 at its Galaxy Unpacked Event in San Francisco.

title: Marvel’s Wolverine PS5 release date revealed, Insomniac promises ‘darker’, ‘brutal’ story
snippet: Marvel's Wolverine will be a playable character in an upcoming game by Insomniac Games, releasing exclusively on PlayStation 5 on September 15, 2026. The game promises a darker take on Wolverine's heroism and features a cast including Mystique and Omega Red.

title: How to watch the Galaxy S26 launch live: Launch time, expected price and major upgrades expected
snippet: Samsung's Galaxy S26 series will debut today at Galaxy Unpacked, featuring S26 Ultra, S26+, and S26 models. The event starts at 10am PT in San Francisco and live-streamed via YouTube.&nbsp;

snippet: In secret briefings held in Washington and Silicon Valley, national security officials warned executives from companies like Apple, Advanced Micro Devices and Qualcomm that China was making plans to retake Taiwan, which Beijing has long considered a breakaway territory.

title: Intel strikes deal with a chip startup its CEO invested in
snippet: Intel, which has lagged in making chips for artificial intelligence, is turning for help to a startup that its CEO helps lead as an investor and chair.

title: OpenAI hires Meta AI researcher who previously led Apple's models team: Report
snippet: OpenAI ​has hired ​Ruoming Pang, a high-profile ‌AI ⁠researcher ⁠at ​Meta, who had ​joined the company ​from ⁠Apple about ‌seven ​months ​ago.

title: Harness, not resist, AI disruption, says TCS CEO K Krithivasan
snippet: Tata Consultancy Services is not resisting disruption from artificial intelligence, but is encouraging its associates to bring AI-led efficiencies even if it compresses the company’s revenue, chief executive K Krithivasan said.

title: TCS is asking staff to use AI even if it hits revenues: CEO K Krithivasan
snippet: Tata Consultancy Services is not resisting disruption from artificial intelligence, but is encouraging its associates to bring AI-led efficiencies even if it compresses the company’s revenue, chief executive K Krithivasan said.

title: US orders diplomats to fight data sovereignty initiatives
snippet: President Donald Trump's administration ​has ordered US diplomats to lobby against attempts to regulate US tech companies' handling of foreigners' data, saying in an internal ​diplomatic cable seen by Reuters that such efforts could interfere with artificial intelligence-related services.

title: Snowflake expects annual product revenue above estimates as AI boosts demand
snippet: Snowflake ​forecast fiscal 2027 product revenue above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, as booming enterprise demand for artificial intelligence tools drives clients to the company's cloud-based data analytics platform.

title: White House to host Big Tech after pledge to rein in power costs
snippet: The White House said on Wednesday ​it will host leading data center and artificial intelligence companies next week, with attendees expected to include Microsoft, Amazon, Anthropic and Meta Platforms to formalize a deal to shield consumers from rising power costs.

title: Just pull a string to turn these tile patterns into useful 3D structures
snippet: MIT researchers have developed a new method for designing 3D structures that can spring up from a flat sheet of interconnected tiles with a single pull of a string. The technique could be used to make foldable bike helmets and medical devices, emergency shelters and field hospitals for disaster zone

title: A retinal reboot for amblyopia
snippet: In the vision disorder amblyopia (or “lazy eye”), impaired vision in one eye early in life causes neural connections in the brain’s visual system to shift toward supporting the other eye, leaving the amblyopic eye less capable even if the original impairment is corrected. title: A new way to rejuvenate the immune system
snippet: As people age, their immune function weakens. Owing to shrinkage of the thymus, where T cells normally mature and diversify, populations of these immune cells become smaller and can’t react to pathogens as quickly. But researchers at MIT and the Broad Institute have now found a way to overcome that

title: A I-designed proteins may help spot cancer
snippet: Researchers at MIT and Microsoft have used artificial intelligence to create molecular sensors that could detect early signs of cancer via a urine test. The researchers developed an AI model to design short proteins that are targeted by enzymes called proteases, which are overactive in cancer cells.

title: Reformulated antibodies could be injected for easier treatment
